name: Pixel Challenge
description:
Hope you enjoy this little project i made!

Move: A, D, Arrow Keys, or Left Stick on Controller

Jump: Space Key, Z key, or A on Controller (Xbox)

Wall Slide: When falling, press against a wall to slow your fall.

Wall Jump: While preforming "Wall Slide" Press the jump button(Space Key, Z key, or A on Controller (Xbox))
